author: anmenaga
body:
## PR Summary

This PR addresses minor issues with PS-package docker tests.
1) Historically rpm package version string was different from other packages, however this is no longer the case, so updating tests to account for that (to simplify things - removing RPM-version parameter from dockerfiles because it is no longer used).
2) Configs that use 'linux-x64.tar.gz' (currently only "opensuse42.2") are failing , so fixing that in the script.
